tos_segment_description.message: The following segment may be against Twitch's TOS. Please be careful.

sponsor_skips_not_allowed.message: You are not allowed to skip placements

stream_video_reactions_allowed.message: You are allowed to watch this video on stream and upload the reaction to YouTube

monetization_allowed.message: You are allowed to monetize the reaction

monetization_not_allowed.message: You are not allowed to monetize the reaction

credit_stream_chat.message: Please link the video in your stream chat

credit_video_description.message: Please link the video in your video description

credit_stream_video.message: Please link the video in the first 3 lines of your video description

sponsor_cut_allowed.message: You are allowed to cut out sponsor placements

sponsor_cut_not_allowed.message: You are not allowed to cut out sponsor placements

reaction_video_includes_title.message: The name of the channel must be mentioned in the title of the reaction video

reaction_video_splittling_not_allowed.message: You are not allowed to split the reaction video into multiple parts

guideline_disclaimer.message: The guidelines are not legally binding and are only a guideline; the channel owner can continue to enforce his rights.

sponsor_block_installed.message: You've installed Sponsor Block, which automatically skips the placement. Please disable it for this video.

sponsor_segment_description.message: You are not allowed to skip this segment of the video.
